summary: electronic supplementary material available to authorized users. weight loss does not appear to correlate well with severity of hindlimb deficits (A) or seizure-like activity (B). each dot represents one ZIKV-infected animal (gray = female, black = male). Lines represent linear regression analysis. sham infected mice died early (n = 2) or late (n = 9) compared to sham infected mice (n = 6) on the right (C) and left sides (D).
